attributes.action: Review the driving licence so drivers have to re-take test every decade.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The laws on the road is an ever evolving thing. New laws pass on the road but drivers only have to pass their test once until they reach 70 years of age.

I petition the PM to force drivers to re-take their test every 10 years. This should help out on road safety.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Review the driving licence so drivers have to re-take test every decade."
